page.title: 09INTERVIEW - HOLIDAY-MAKER 1
page.content: My name is Harry Clegg, and I am 54 and married to Elsie who is 50. We live in Manchester and have been coming to Blackpool for two weeks for the past twenty-seven years. We also stay at the same boarding house which is more like a second home. Though the weather is not always as nice as we would like it to be, there is always plenty to do when it is bad. Elsie loves her bingo and shopping and in the evening there are plenty of shows and places to go for a drink, which are usually very lively. We both find the place very friendly, and we will be coming back at the same time next year.
